snoopy.blindnote: sno/scaRNAs with same target 18S rRNA G683 : SNORD19 SNORD19B (20100701末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: uttenhofer, A., Kiefmann, M., Meier-Ewert, S., O'Brien, J., Lehrach, H., Bachellerie, J. P., and Brosius, J. (2001). RNomics: an experimental approach that identifies 201 candidates for novel, small, non-messenger RNAs in mouse. Embo J 20, 2943-2953.
